title: can't login
body:
net is working fine client loaded up without issue but it wont connect to server when i try to login

-Edit- 

https://support.riotgames.com/entries/234161-Connection-Failure-Error-When-Logging-In 

Link doesn't work, apparently it doesn't exist, got the link from leagues login issue message, :s should probably be updated since its not there anymore :s

replies.body:
Hi,

It looks like the page you're trying to hit has been moved [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

To your issue - it sounds like the DNS issue described in[ the sticky thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom) in this board, which can also prevent you from looking up websites that are a sub domain of riotgames.com

I'd suggest as a first step, you go over the steps mentioned in that post, and see if that helps resolve the issue.

Cheers
Mindstar

Thats the issue, i have done all those kinds of things. even rebooted my modem and reset all the modem information. I have league going again now it started working. just nothing i tried worked, so am a bit confused as to what went wrong :s but its working so unless it happens again wont bother with it :) thank you for replying though <3
